column1: Little Goat Diner////A peer of mine ordered a malt milkshake
column2: and I sampled a bit. It literally just tasted like a Maltese in liquid form! It was heavenly
column3: but also very heavy and sugary. Needless to say
column4: I was impressed when he finished the milkshake
column5: along with his smoked corned beef
column6: an order of apple pancakes (that he was supposed to share with a friend)
